title: Sengoku Basara: Judge End (Sengoku BASARA: End of Judgement)
synopsis: Based on CAPCOM's 2010 game Sengoku Basara 3 (Sengoku Basara: Samurai Heroes), Sengoku Basara: Judge End will depict the epic Battle of Sekigahara.
